short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close all google meet tabs at once using shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+P

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension would help you in closing all those google meet tabs which tend to clutter your chrome session at once.

Default Shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+P
Reopen Tabs: Ctrl+Shift+T (reopens the tabs in order)

Remapping the shortcut
Settings > Extensions > Left hamburger menu > Keyboard shortcuts
